page_content: The page discusses the training and requirements for becoming a draftsman in the field of civil engineering.
The page provides information about the profession of an electronics technician, including software development tasks.
The page introduces a new online directory named "Kompass St.Gallen" for health and social support services.
The page discusses the results of a habitat assessment for the St. Gallen forest, focusing on wildlife impact.
The page discusses the procurement and implementation of a new school administration software called "PUPIL" for St. Gallen schools.
The page focuses on occupational health and safety, including regulations and guidelines for employers and employees.
The page provides guidelines and regulations for the disposal of construction waste, including separation and treatment requirements.
